record.description: The McDonald telescope assembled for testing within Warner and Swasey's Cleveland, Ohio plant. The company designed and built both the observatory, in the Davis Mountains of Western Texas, and its 82-inch reflecting telescope, the second largest in the world for the University of Texas, which will operate the facility with the University of Chicago.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations.
